inclusion.criterion: nulliparous or multiparous women with intrauterine pregnancies
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: receiving twice daily treatment doses of enoxaparin (1 mg/kg ± 20% SC BID)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: subjects who consent to the study
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: receiving enoxaparin at prophylactic doses (i.e., 30 mg twice daily or 40 mg daily)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has Hashimoto's thyroiditis and is receiving Levothyroxine treatment. She is overweight but her symptoms have improved significantly since starting the medication.
